docs.lastfm_tags: fado, Portugal, portuguese, folk, seen live
docs.lastfm_content_artist: Deolinda is a project from Lisbon, Portugal, inspired by fado and its traditional roots in order to create original songs based on portuguese traditional and popular music. It came to life in 2006, by the hands of 4 young musicians with diverse musical backgrounds and experiences (such as classical music, jazz, ethnical and traditional music), searching to recreate a sound rooted in popular music through the crossing of different musical languages and musical research serving as a base for the group's original compositions. Their first album - Canção ao Lado was released in 2008. "...Her name is Deolinda and she is old enough to realize that life isnt as easy as it seems. Merrily unmarried, in love and out of love, born in Lisbon, she inhabits a ground floor apartment somewhere in the suburbs of the capital. She writes her own songs by peeking through the curtains of her window, drawing inspiration from the old gramophone records that once belonged to her grandmother and by the bizarre and strange life of her neighbours. She lives with 2 cats and a gold fish..." Taken from the website:http://www.deolinda.com.pt/ Deolinda are: Ana Bacalhau (vocals), Zé Pedro Leitão (doublebass), Pedro da Silva Martins (classical guitar) and Luís José Martins (classical guitar). Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.

docs.title: Mar Vermelho
docs.lastfm_content_artist: Laysa Moretti (29 de dezembro de 1991), mais conhecida pelo seu nome artístico Laysa, é uma rapper e compositora brasileira natural de Osasco, São Paulo. Ganhou destaque em 2016 quando seu EP de estreia "129129" foi lançado, com letras que traduzem a experiência feminina na sociedade brasileira a partir de um ponto de vista original e sem censuras. Em uma mistura de hip hop, reggae, trap e funk, o disco amalgamou o mais clássico e mais inovador da sonoridade da ilha caribenha ao mais autêntico e moderno hip-hop, criando uma assinatura musical única e remexendo as pistas com uma carga eletrônica pesada costurada pelo produtor Léo Grijó. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.

docs.lastfm_content_artist: Soul Rebel project was born in the Summer of 2002 when some young boys from Mogliano Veneto, near Venezia, decided to play some Bob Marley's songs in a "mojan reggae style". Soon the group is set: Rosa Brunello at the bass and Federico Ros at the drums joined together into a leading rhythmic duo, Rocco D'Aguanno marks the sound with the typical reggae drops of his guitar, at the keyboards and synths Fabrizio Pittalis give an electro touch to Soul Rebel music. They need the wonderful voices of Celeste Matarese and Giovanni Brunello to perform the perfect Mojan Reggae Style in town. The guys meet and play at Rocco's house, making in it a full optional improvement room and a melting pot of creativity and friendships. They create the first songs Mojan Reggae Style and Brown and soon Soul Rebel goes out of Mogliano to play in Triveneto and for some contests. In November 2003 they record the first demo "Suonare il nostro vizio" ("Playing is our vice") with four songs. In the following years the Rebels play in pubs, centri sociali and for different manifestations offering their songs talking about love and existentialism but also expressing their opposition to war and injustices. In 2006 they begin working on the first Soul Rebel eleven tracks album and in the meanwhile they go on playing in and out of town. In Spring the Rebels compete in a contest in Slovenia where they take the 2nd place and are admitted to the final national contest on Rototom Sunsplash stage. In Summer Soul Rebel play as special guests of Caparezza at Marcon Festival and confirm their interest in social playing in the jail of Venezia. Read more on Last.fm. docs.lastfm_content_artist: Renato Alves Menezes Barreto better known by his stage name Froid is a rapper born in Belo Horizonte in 1993. Froid has a gold record for the single "SK8 do Matheus" with Rodrigo Cartier, and 2x platinum record for the single "Lamentável III " with Cynthia Luz. Currently, Froid lives in Brasilia mainly after the birth of his son. His artistic name Froid comes in honor of the thinker and father of psychoanalysis Sigmund Freud, in its simplified version for Portuguese, the Brazilian artist decided to exchange Freud for Froid. In his songs Froid tries to bring ideas about social problems and his view of the world, in one of his most famous songs "Pseudosocial" the singer makes clear some views about the world and exposes social problems in his verses. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.

docs.lastfm_content_artist: Mombojó is a Brazilian band from Recife, Pernambuco. They have played many times at the Abril Pro Rock Festival. Their debut, entitled Nadadenovo, was distributed in April 2004 by OutraCoisa magazine. Since their beginning in April 2001, Mombojó has been collecting important experiences for the actual work of the band. In 2002 Mombojó was in one of the most important festivals in Brazil, and received great reviews from the press for their concert in the 10th Abril Pro Rock. In 2003, the band was benefited by Pernambuco's government to record their first Album: Nadadenovo. Recorded and mixed in Recife by Igor Medeiros and Mad Mud (Leo D & William P), and mastered in São Paulo (Classic Master), the album soon got public and media attention. Nadadenovo has fifteen tracks with many local folk influences, local instruments and electronic samples. On July 6th, 2007 Rafael (aka "O Rafa"), 24 years old, the trombone and flute player, who was always by the side of Marcelo Campello, passed away from a heart attack. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.

docs.lastfm_content_artist: Great performances are not born just of great talent; they require a deep camaraderie among the performers. Luma strikes the perfect combination of European creativity and American energy, as four individuals disappear, melding into one cohesive force of rock and roll. Hearing a band on the radio or a CD is one thing, but not many bands can ignite a live crowd like Luma does. And now Luma’s ability as a live act has finally been documented for all their fans, old and new, in their “Luma: Live at the Jazz Lab” DVD, set to be released in the latter half of 2007. Ever since the band’s inception in 2005, the members of Luma have concentrated on honing their live show; and a loyal, growing fan base is evidence of their success. In fact, online readers of the Oklahoma Gazette voted the band as the 2007 Woody Award winner for “Rock Band of the Year.” Between Hunter Goodman’s beautifully melodic vocals, Stephen Collins’ soulful guitar riffs, Marcus Collins’ solid bass lines, and Adam Chamberlain’s raw energy on the drums, each member contributes a crucial and talented role in Luma’s captivating performance. Michael Senior of The Daily Oklahoman writes, “Luma presents a gripping sound and live performance. Luma’s songs have a way of entrancing you and hooking you into the melody and groove.” Luma released their self-titled EP in June 2006, to critical praise and fan enthusiasm. Their first single from the EP, “Lose Control,” was voted into the Top 8 in 94.7 The Buzz’s 2006 “March Bandness” online competition. Drawing from the sounds of Coldplay, U2, Audioslave, Incubus and more, “Luma blends soaring vocals and polished musicianship to weave a complex and transcendent sound – one with an echoic ambiance where guitars flutter in and out, and harmonies gently rise and fade.” (Joe Wertz, Oklahoma Gazette) Early into their musical career, Luma has already shared the stage with some of the best indie acts around, both in and out of state. Thus far, Luma has hit the road throughout the Midwestern region and continues to play for large crowds in their hometown of Oklahoma City. Whether on CD, DVD, or in person, Luma’s music will draw you into a place only great bands can; a place where you lose yourself in the anthem that overtakes and engulfs you. http://www.myspace.com/lumarock Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.

docs.lastfm_content_artist: This page is home to at least eight different artists. 1) The Grim Reapers/Fuse: Fuse made a little-known album for Epic at the end of the '60s, and is chiefly remembered for including two future members of Cheap Trick: Rick Nielsen and Tom Petersson. The album is an average, perhaps somewhat below average, late-'60s hard rock recording. It looks forward to some facets of '70s metal and art rock in its overwrought vocals, tandem hard rock guitar riffs, and classical-influenced keyboards. It was reissued, with two bonus tracks from a single, by Rewind in 2001. Fuse was originally the Grim Reapers, and aroused interest from Epic after they were seen supporting Terry Reid in Chicago in mid-1968. Changing their name to Fuse, they recorded a self-titled album in late 1968 under the unlikely auspices of producer Jackie Mills, who later produced The Brady Bunch. The album did virtually nothing, and although they did have enough material for a second album, they would not release another LP prior to their breakup in 1970. 2) FUSE are also a defunct heavy rock band, who formed in Bahrain in the middle east while still at school where they recorded two EP's and a live album (Pretending to be Perfect) before relocating to Edingburgh and released a series of albums with a progressively heavier sound; and a DVD before breaking up in late 2005 or early 2006. 3) There is also a project by Richie Hawtin (Plastikman) named "F.U.S.E" which is tagged here mainly as Detroit Techno. First vinyls by F.U.S.E came out in the early 90s on +8 Records. These singles were famous in that time and had some influences on the noisy technohouse movement. 4) FUSE is electric violinists Ben Lee & Linzi Stoppard. When Ben and Linzi set out to break the mould and push the boundaries they realised they had two choices: to be followers or to show the way with initiative. The latter was the only real option. While following their instincts the band recognised their competition had all failed to conquer the same conundrum - how does a new violin act avoid sounding exactly the same as the one before? Other string acts call themselves electric but often record using acoustic instrument or with no effects which limits them sonically. This narrow path leads to most violin / cross-over string acts covering the same music again and again and in the same style. 5) An alternative metal/rock band from Doncaster, United Kingdom, during the early 1990's. Fuse made a joint vinyl e.p. with Scum Pups on Stayfree Music at the end of the 1993. 6) Fuse is also a swedish straight edge hardcore-band from Gothenburg http://www.myspace.com/fusehardcore 7) An American hardcore band from Fort Lauderdale, Florida http://www.myspace.com/fusepureinfection 8) Fuse was a alternative metal/nu-metal band from San Antonio, TX 9) An International Hard Rock band based in Muscat, Oman. 10) A drumandbass/lo-fi/house DJ, based at Varna, Bulgaria 11) A novice drum and bass DJ & producer based in Tallinn, Estonia 12) A string ensemble from Amsterdam, the Netherlands 13) Singapore hardcore punk band. https://fusenoise.bandcamp.com/ 14) Japanese hardcore punk band from Hiroshima, active in the mid 80's. Alternately known as "The Fuse". Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.

docs.title: Deusa Gaia
docs.lyrics:
Seremos imortais, seremos imorais
A fénix não renasce foi queimada demais
Deusa Gaia morre à fome, há fome no planeta
Somos asas de impiedade neste efeito borboleta
A realidade é mais pesada do que a ficção
A arca de Noé transporta coca no porão

A tristeza, a guerra, o fanatismo, religião
Petróleo, a Terra, o clima que se altera
A violência, a droga, o tráfico infantil
A educação com fome, a depressão que nos consome
A fé na riqueza, a mágoa na pobreza
Abate florestal, economia canibal
1 cigarro para a mãe...bebé nasceu asmático
Não, baleias não conseguem digerir o plástico
Alteração genética, bomba nuclear
Saúde é um luxo, terrorismo é vaidade
Nova ordem mundial, desordem mundial
Prepotência impotente, Oriente, Ocidente
Negócios, doença, indústria farmacêutica
Obesa...nobreza...humanidade...empresa

Tratas os animais como te tratas a ti

De nós próprios, somos arrogantes?
Seremos conscientes? Queremos curar este mundo mas no fundo

docs.lastfm_tags: rap, Rap Nacional, Ao Cubo, hip hop, christian hip-hop
docs.lastfm_content_artist: A LONGA HISTÓRIA DE UM ANO É com muita satisfação e orgulho que lhe entregamos nosso 1º histórico de um ano de vida, onde apresentamos nossa história e nossos principais projetos. O QUE É O GRUPO AO CUBO é um grupo musical-rap, de origem brasileira, anglo-paulistana, de ideologia cristã, responsável pela composição, produção e interpretação de suas músicas. MISSÃO Através de canções racionais e criativas, divulgar a paz com entretenimento, sem distinção de público. CURIOSIDADES Ao contrario do que muitos pensam, o nome AO CUBO não significa a união dos três integrantes, mas sim, a trindade onipotente de Deus (Pai, Filho e Espírito Santo). ONDE ESTÁVAMOS Depois de adquirirmos algumas experiências individuais pelo cenário do rap, Feijão, no grupo Jeová Jiré, Cleber, pelo Apocalipse Urbano, e Fjay, DJ profissional pela Fildzz produções atuando em discotecagem em bailes e shows de rap. Nos encontramos no grupo Alternativa C., onde permanecemos por aproximadamente 7 anos, tendo como trabalho um CD single, ‘‘Apenas Começando”, e apresentações pela capital e interior de São Paulo. O grupo foi marcado pelas apresentações teatrais, algumas chamadas de espetáculo pela crítica e mídia direcionada. Com a ampliação de nossos conhecimentos e ambições, e novos ideais, achamos que o grupo precisava de uma reformulação na imagem. Permanecemos no Alternativa C., até novembro de 2002, quando decidimos finalizar as atividades, sendo que o quarto integrante, preferiu reativar o grupo individualmente, foi então surgiu o Grupo AO CUBO. ONDE ESTAMOS Desde 13 de abril de 2003 até meados de abril de 2004, o Grupo AO CUBO, se concentrou no formato e construção de sua imagem. Foi exatamente nesse período que estivemos em estúdio produzindo nosso primeiro CD, com o título ‘‘Respire Fundo’’. O CD se constitui de treze faixas, sendo que dez delas são músicas escritas e produzidas pelo próprio grupo. Integram também no CD, algumas participações especiais como os amigos Luo (APC 16), Júnior e Jesrrael (Raul Gil), e Templo Soul. Foi nesse período também, que produzimos nosso Show “Respire Fundo’’; um show impulsionado por nossos ideais, neles contamos com uma equipe integrada, criativa e compromissada, que proporciona ainda mais qualidade ao trabalho do grupo. Temos contado com o apoio de meios de comunicação como a rádio 105 FM (105,1 FM), Objetiva Sat (98,5 FM), Nossa Rádio (93.1 FM) e importantes rádios comunitárias que vem transmitindo diariamente as músicas Naquela Sala e 1980. Contamos também com um grande apoio do site Rap Nacional e futuramente com o site Real Hip-Hop, sites estes que respeitam e investem no rap do nosso país. É para esse tipo de apoio que devemos o rápido sucesso do grupo Ao Cubo, como prova disso, estamos concorrendo em 4 categorias no festival Hip-Hop Top SP. Categoria de Melhor Grupo, Grupo Revelação, Grupo Gospel e Melhor Música. Atualmente o grupo AO CUBO, está comprometido com a gravadora independente, É Nóis na Fita Produções, que tem respeitado os critérios de qualidade e ideologia do grupo, uma parceria compromissada com o sucesso. ONDE ESTAREMOS O Grupo AO CUBO, está empenhado na realização de um objetivo de amplo alcance, a médio prazo, esperamos conquistar os públicos que se relacionam com o rap a nível Brasil, tornando o nome AO CUBO, referência e respeito no cenário. A longo prazo, vamos criar ações relacionadas ao terceiro setor, com a missão de integrar e gerenciar projetos, nas áreas do esporte e desenvolvimento da cultura, esses conjuntos de ações traduzem nosso compromisso com a responsabilidade social, que permanece presente em nossa ideologia e claramente enunciada em nossas canções. O que buscamos sempre na condução de nossas atividades é contribuir para a construção de um futuro melhor para o Brasil. CAMINHO DO CRESCIMENTO Ao entregar-lhe esse release, acreditamos que estamos compartilhando nosso trabalho com você, alguém que pode contribuir com nossos ideais e sentir o prazer da solidificação dos nossos objetivos. Contato com o AO CUBO: 3129-5895/ 8291-0710 ou aocubo@rapnacional.com.br com Priscila. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.

docs.lastfm_tags: hip hop, hip hop tuga, seen live, Portugal, dealema
docs.lastfm_content_artist: Mundo surge como um dos principais promotores da cultura HipHop, desde o seu início, em Portugal. Tanto como músico, como na produção e gravação de outros artistas, organização de eventos (é responsável pela realização as NovaGaiaHipHop Sessions, do HardClub, desde 1998), entre outras iniciativas impulsionadoras. No que toca à música, com instrumentais e versos, está associado a inúmeros álbuns, projectos e concertos, desde 1995. Nomes como Mind da Gap ou Blasted Mechanism (se quisermos ir por outros géneros), destacam-se na lista de colaborações e participações. Quanto a ao vivo, com Dealema, evidenciam-se os palcos principais dos Festivais de Paredes de Coura, Sudoeste, SuperBockSuperRock, assim como os de inúmeras Queimas das Fitas. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.

docs.lastfm_content_artist: Igor de Oliveira Kuwahara, conhecido artisticamente como Mc Igu, é um rapper que nasceu em Yamanashi, província japonesa conhecida por ter parte do famoso Monte Fuji em seu território, e ainda pequeno veio para Itapetininga, município do estado de São Paulo, Brasil. Igu mistura diferentes estilos e influências nas suas composições, trazendo uma roupagem totalmente única para o trap, estilo que vem se popularizando no Brasil. Read more on Last.fm.
